title: Comisión de Actividades Infantiles
text:
Comisión de Actividades Infantiles (<a href="English%20language">English</a>: "Committee on Children's Activities"), also known simply as CAI, is an <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> club located in the city of <a href="Comodoro%20Rivadavia">Comodoro Rivadavia</a>, of <a href="Chubut%20Province">Chubut Province</a>. The team plays in <a href="Torneo%20Argentino%20A">Torneo Argentino A</a>.
The club was founded on 1 January 1984, as a <a href="sports%20club">sports club</a> for young people, though by 1989 the activity focused only on football. The team currently plays in the <a href="Primera%20B%20Nacional%20Argentina">Primera B</a> division of the Argentine league (which is equivalent to the second division). Home games are played at the <a href="Estadio%20Municipal%20de%20Comodoro%20Rivadavia">Estadio Municipal de Comodoro Rivadavia</a>, which has a capacity of approximately 10,000 seats. The club focuses primarily on the development of players from its youth divisions.
Current squad.
As of November 2017.
